group_1.textCenter: I've got the Witch. You guys do what ya want.

group_1.textRight: Hey, wait!
Geeze... She does whatever she feels like,@as usual...
I'll go too, Mami.

group_1.textLeft: Homura, can you help the captives?

group_1.textRight: I'm on it!

group_1.textLeft: Madoka, you and I will provide support.

group_1.textRight: Okay! Our long-range weapons are perfect for@that!
I want to go help Kyoko, but ya just gotta@get in my way...
[flashEffect:flashWhite2][surround:2004A09]Get lost!
I'm not done!
(I can't get to the captives unless I defeat@all these Familiars.)
(I don't want to make things harder for@Madoka, so...)
(I need to get rid of them quickly.)
...Get out of my way!
[flashEffect:flashWhite2][se:4005_equip_arms_grenade_vh]Hah!

group_1.textCenter: (It's my job to keep the Familiars away from@these people.)
(I have to protect them so Madoka and the@others can concentrate on the Witch.)

group_1.textRight: [flashEffect:flashRed2][se:3001_chara_damage][chara:200600:effect_shake][bgEffect:shakeLarge]Tgh!

group_1.textLeft: 欲土衆音　生聞生彼　已土樂者

group_1.textRight: Aw crap, she's not lettin' up. It's gonna be @hard to keep avoidin' these attacks.

group_1.textCenter: Mami's ribbon? It pulled me away.
Wait, keep this on me and whip me over her@head!
[flashEffect:flashRed2][surround:2006A03][chara:6107:effect_shake][bgEffect:shakeLarge]願遣目皆　阿德連是　菩薩是妙

group_1.textRight: [flashEffect:flashWhite2][surround:2004A09]I'm right behind you! Yaaah!

group_1.textLeft: [flashEffect:flashRed2][surround:2004A13][chara:6107:effect_shake][bgEffect:shakeLarge]言實苦聖　何年終人　六勤白大

group_1.textRight: Ugh... She doesn't wanna go down!
Looks like we've got a stubborn one!

group_1.textLeft: 況有樂切　時是世尊　極界世一

group_1.textRight: She's about to attack again! Get ready!
I know!
...Wait! It was a feint?!
Madoka! Mami!
...Right!

group_1.textCenter: [flashEffect:flashWhite2][bgEffect:shakeSmall]世汝衆闍　名等世阿　次生處時
(After we beat Walpurgisnacht, too! How can@this be happening?!)

group_1.textRight: Don't worry, Homura!
You keep those people safe!

group_1.textLeft: Kyoko and Sayaka saved us when they knocked@her off balance.

group_1.textRight: You know it!
Yeah, I am!
I want to do what I can.
I want to protect Mitakihara and all of my@friends who live here.
And if we all do what we can...
Little by little, all our efforts will pile@up together.
I feel like we'll be able to create a better@future that way.
I mean, if Ui can come back in Kamihama...
And the system that keeps us safe from@turning into Witches is still there...
It's because...
Everyone tried their hardest and did what@they could.
That's why I'm going to keep on doing what@I can, too.

group_1.textLeft: It's important to reach for what we can.
Hey! If you're okay over there, then help us@out!

group_1.textRight: We'll cut through, you guys take over after@that!
[flashEffect:flashWhite2][surround2004A09]Hyah!
All right! We'll finish it with this!

group_1.textCenter: [se:6009_hit_shooting_05_h][se:6003_hit_shooting_02_vh]爾天人修　阿殊好阿　相時特難
(Everyone's carrying out their own roles, but@we're helping each other...)
(And each of them is stronger than they@used to be...)
(It's because of what happened in Kamihama.)

group_1.textLeft: Homura, hurry! The Labyrinth is about to@collapse!

group_1.textRight: We gotta get these people outta here!
All set, let's go.
